problemResponseText: I'm sorry you are experiencing a problem here at Sparrow can you please explain the problem you are experiencing?
commentsResponseText: We love hearing from our patients and patient families, go ahead and reply to this message with your feedback!
keywordMissResponseText: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Please reply with PROBLEM to report a problem, or COMMENTS to provide general feedback.
thanksProblemText: Thanks for reporting this problem. We will reach out to you if we need additional information.
thanksCommentsText: Thanks for taking the time to help improve the patient experience here at Sparrow!
